description: Describes the specified conversion tasks or all your conversion tasks. For more information, see the VM Import/Export User Guide. For information about the import manifest referenced by this API action, see VM Import Manifest.

nested_items.name: ConversionTasks
nested_items.description: Information about the conversion tasks.

nested_items.name: ConversionTaskId
nested_items.description: The ID of the conversion task.

nested_items.name: ExpirationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the task expires. If the upload isn't complete before the expiration time, we automatically cancel the task.

nested_items.name: ImportInstance
nested_items.description: If the task is for importing an instance, this contains information about the import instance task.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the task.

nested_items.name: InstanceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the instance.

nested_items.name: Platform
nested_items.description: The instance operating system.

nested_items.name: Volumes
nested_items.description: The volumes.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone where the resulting instance will reside.

nested_items.name: BytesConverted
nested_items.description: The number of bytes converted so far.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the task.

nested_items.name: Checksum
nested_items.description: The checksum computed for the disk image.

nested_items.name: Format
nested_items.description: The disk image format.

nested_items.name: ImportManifestUrl
nested_items.description: A presigned URL for the import manifest stored in Amazon S3. For information about creating a presigned URL for an Amazon S3 object, read the 'Query String Request Authentication Alternative' section of the Authenticating REST Requests topic in the Amazon Simple Storage Service Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: Size
nested_items.description: The size of the disk image, in GiB.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the import of this particular disk image.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: The status information or errors related to the disk image.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The volume identifier.

nested_items.name: Size
nested_items.description: The size of the volume, in GiB.

nested_items.name: ImportVolume
nested_items.description: If the task is for importing a volume, this contains information about the import volume task.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone where the resulting volume will reside.

nested_items.name: BytesConverted
nested_items.description: The number of bytes converted so far.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description you provided when starting the import volume task.

nested_items.name: Checksum
nested_items.description: The checksum computed for the disk image.

nested_items.name: Format
nested_items.description: The disk image format.

nested_items.name: ImportManifestUrl
nested_items.description: A presigned URL for the import manifest stored in Amazon S3. For information about creating a presigned URL for an Amazon S3 object, read the 'Query String Request Authentication Alternative' section of the Authenticating REST Requests topic in the Amazon Simple Storage Service Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: Size
nested_items.description: The size of the disk image, in GiB.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The volume identifier.

nested_items.name: Size
nested_items.description: The size of the volume, in GiB.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the conversion task.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message related to the conversion task.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Any tags assigned to the task.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.
